item.title: I need help with when i die were i spwan
item.dc:creator: @ingo345 ingo345
item.description:
@ingo345 wrote:

ok so i went to player.java and i made it when u make account u spwan in diffent place but now…

when i die i spwan in old place but when i make new account i spwan in new place here my code

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 2896; // 2896; teleportToY = 3511; // 3511; 
    // client initially doesn't know those values yet
    absX = absY = -1;
    mapRegionX = mapRegionY = -1;
    currentX = currentY = 0;
    resetWalkingQueue();
}</blockquote>
